DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effectiveness Glucobay combine basal insulin daily-life treatment condition large sample Korean patient .
DOC.brief_title: GlucoFriend-evaluation Effectiveness Glucobay When Combined With Basal Insulin
DOC.criteria: Signed write informed consent Age ≥ 18 year Diagnosed type 2 diabetes least 6 month prior enrollment Patients treat stable dose basal insulin ( insulin glargine insulin detemir ) least 2 month HbA1C≥7.5 ≤10.0 % Exclusion criterion must read conjunction local product information
